note:
Oh Canada!
Childhood wonderment intact .. Adult reality = wtf are we doing folks!

We all have a choice. We can create transformational action that will safeguard the living conditions for future generations. Or we can continue with our business as usual and fail. Greta Thunburg

The sooner we stop clinging to the old ways and focus on building a smarter, more sustainable, more equitable future for everyone, the better off we – and every living thing on this planet – will be....Jeff Goodell

fields.name: Earth (our home) is worth a price on pollution!
